name: Healthism
tag_list: healthism, wellness, prevention, healthcare, weight-loss, dieting, fitness
overview:
Healthism is an innovative startup developing a revolutionary new web and mobile application which provides personalized, evidence-based preventive health and lifestyle recommendations to health care consumers.

The Healthism signature application is a “one-stop shop” where our users can learn how to prevent major diseases, promote personal wellness, and facilitate lifestyle changes with utmost ease. Our portal to the world of preventive health is redefining the aims of medicine through technology by encouraging prevention like it has never been done before.

Right now we are in stealth mode as our team of developers, designers and epidemiologists are hard at work in the Healthism laboratory. We have put you and your needs at the epicenter of our design objectives. We are more than excited to show you our dream.
